question: Can you walk me through your journey into web development?
What is your favorite part about building websites or web applications?
Which technologies or tools do you enjoy working with the most, and why?
Tell me about a small project or experiment you worked on that you are proud of.
How do you usually start a new web development project?
If you had unlimited resources, what kind of web application would you build?
What do you find most exciting about modern web development trends?
How do you keep yourself updated with the latest web development practices?
Can you share a moment when you solved a tricky bug or performance issue?
What motivates you to keep learning and improving as a web developer?
